attributes.action: Under 25’s should be payed same benefit and same wage as over 25’s!!
attributes.additional_details: As for someone under 25 they get 251£ universal credit over 25 year olds get 317£ if single person which is wrong everyone is equal we are all still human so let’s fight for this cause and get the right result
attributes.background: 25 and over are getting a considerate amount more then under 25’s which is foul we are all humans and if ur doing the same job as someone as why shouldn’t u get payed what they payed its human rights it’s fair rights in a work place let’s get this sorted once and for all everyone
